languages.text: Каждый отдельный случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дает существу +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней), увеличивающего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа все уровни смягчения снимаются.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Каждый отдельный случай получения урона дает существу +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней), увеличивающего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа все уровни смягчения снимаются.

Каждый отдельный случай получения урона дает существу +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней), увеличивающего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа все уровни смягчения снимаются.

At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.
languages.original_text: Каждый отдельный случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дает существу +1 уровень эффекта "смягчение" (до 10 уровней), увеличивающего {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} на 1. В начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существа все уровни смягчения снимаются.

traits.locale_text: Each instance of damage grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 deflection for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next turn all mitigation stacks are removed.

Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

languages.text: 每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得1层“缓解攻势”效果，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高1点，最多10层。当此生物下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物受到伤害时，都会获得1层“缓解攻势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高1点，最多10层。当此生物下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。

每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得1层“缓解攻势”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，每层“缓解攻势”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高1点，最多10层。当此生物下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有“缓解攻势”层数都将移除。

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび軽減効果のスタックを+1獲得し、スタックごとに+1の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る（最大10スタック）。彼らの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に、全ての軽減スタックは取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: この生物はダメージを受けるたび軽減{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタックを+1獲得し、スタックごとに+1の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る（最大10スタック）。彼らの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に、全ての軽減スタックは取り除かれる。

この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび軽減{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを+1獲得し、スタックごとに+1の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る（最大10スタック）。彼らの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に、全ての軽減スタックは取り除かれる。

languages.text: Cada vez que recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, esta criatura obtiene +1 acumulación del efecto mitigación, lo que le otorga +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por acumulación (máximo 10). Al comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pierde todas las acumulaciones de mitigación.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que recibe daño, esta criatura obtiene +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} mitigación, lo que le otorga +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por acumulación (máximo 10). Al comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pierde todas las acumulaciones de mitigación.

languages.text: Wenn diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, erhält sie +1 Stapel des Effektes "Schadensreduzierung", wobei sie für jeden gesapelten Effekt +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} erhält (bis zu 10-mal). Zu Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} werden alle gestapelten Effekte entfernt.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn diese Kreatur Schaden nimmt, erhält sie +1 Mal den aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schadensreduzierung, wobei sie für jeden aufaddierten Effekt +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} erhält (bis zu 10 Mal). Zu Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} werden alle aufaddierten Effekte entfernt.

languages.text: Chaque instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} confère à cette créature +1 cumul de l'effet Atténuation, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} par cumul (jusqu'à 10 cumuls). Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, tous les cumuls de l'effet Atténuation sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Chaque instance de dégâts confère à cette créature +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Atténuation, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} par cumul (jusqu'à 10 cumuls). Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, tous les cumuls de l'effet Atténuation sont supprimés.

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} silsilesi, bu yaratığa +1 hafifletme etkisi birikimi kazandırır ve yaratık her birikim için (maksimum 10 birikim) +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri elde eder. Bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında tüm hafifletme birikimleri ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Each instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} grants this creature +1 stack of the mitigation effect, gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack (up to 10 stacks). At the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all mitigation stacks are removed.
